page.title: ServerlessDays Cardiff - Siobhan Stephens
page.description: Many renters find it difficult to get on the housing ladder and local start-up TenantFootprint aims to help solve this.  Hear about how Serverless technology has been used to bridge the gap between boostrap and scale up.

speaker.name: Siobhan Stephens
speaker.title: Software engineer at Mobilise and Digital Apprentice
speaker.bio: Siobhan is a software engineer at Mobilise, a digital cloud development business in Swansea, and currently undertaking a Degree Apprenticeship at University of Wales Trinity Saint David (UWTSD)

talk.title: Using Serverless to help Generation Rent
talk.abstract: Many renters find it difficult to get on the housing ladder and local start-up TenantFootprint aims to help solve this.  Hear about how Serverless technology has been used to bridge the gap between boostrap and scale up.
